summary: Website for engineering college students to access free study materials and books for all subjects.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal academic logo with book + gear motif, flat vector style (studyhub-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Engineering students studying with books and laptop, warm neutral palette, flat illustration (studyhub-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a public, mobile-friendly website that lets engineering college students browse and access free study materials and books organized by academic structure (e.g., department/branch, semester, subject).
Implement a searchable and filterable resource catalog UI so students can quickly find materials by keyword and filter by department/semester/subject/resource type.

Provide a simple admin-only management interface to add, edit, and remove resource entries, while keeping reading/downloading public (no login required for students). Use Internet Identity for admin authentication.
Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme across the site (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) suitable for an academic resource library. Do not use a blue+purple primary palette.
Add generated static image assets (logo and a hero illustration) under frontend/public/assets/generated and display them on the Home page and site header.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a website providing free study materials and books for engineering college subjects
Add a backend data model and API for managing the study resources catalog (departments/semesters/subjects/resources) so the frontend can list and query resources.

projectName: Free Study Materials & Books Website for Engineering Students
